metadata.name: In the Flow of Time - Awakening
metadata.description:
How much is a piece of time worth to you?

Every moment presented in this series was not staged and could never be replicated. Here I am not selling you a photo. I am offering you a piece of time that once meant something to someone.

This is 1/3rd of a second from Tokyo, Japan on December 9th, 2016.

Edition 1/1
